nodes.text: Terror in the Trees is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures Battles game, written by Stephen Crane and published in Imperial Entanglements. It depicts a battle as stranded stormtroopers launch a retaliatory assault on an Ewok village high up in the forest canopy after the Battle of Endor. The Ewoks must defend their village with the help of some visiting Rebels and an assortment of tricks and traps.
